annotation_sentence: Hello, um, I want to buy... how to say, the thing for cook rice?

annotation_sentence: Yes, rice cooker. This one look very nice. But, um, how much it cost?

annotation_sentence: Oh, $60... um, is it possible to, uh... how to say, get lower price?

annotation_sentence: Oh, 10% discount, that is good. But, um, can you do little more cheaper?

annotation_sentence: Okay, okay, that is good. So, I pay now, yes?

annotation_sentence: Ah, okay, I understand. Thank you for help me.
